metadata.name: Weekend Warrior
metadata.description:
A beautiful moment, frozen in time. Carving a deep powder turn, from darkness to light, as if you were flying. In this instant, nothing else matters.

For the weekend warriors out there who have a taste for adventure and want to get their feet snowy, this edition is for you.

This token also acts as your ticket to redeem the Avid Adventurer Edition, Epic Explorer Edition, and Living Legend 1/1.

Burn 2 x Weekend Warrior = 1 Avid Adventurer, edition of 35  
Burn 5 x Weekend Warrior = 1 Epic Explorer, edition of 15  
Burn 69 x Weekend Warrior = 1 Living Legend, 1/1

Holding 1 Weekend Warrior, 1 Avid Adventurer, and 1 Epic Explorer, or 1 Living Legend, gives you the OPTION to contribute to the creation of a unique 1/1 photography NFT with me. If you choose to contribute, you will vote on choices including genre, subject, location, time of year, etc. You will also receive behind-the-scenes updates on my process of getting and editing said 1/1. Once the 1/1 is created, it will be raffled off to a maximum of 15 holders of all 3 editions plus 1 living legend holder.
